full_threads.body: (Time: 10mins) investigation and backtracking

Hi Faye,

Thank you so much for letting me know!

We’ve scheduled the "Managing Emergencies" banner to go live on the home page starting 22 December, just like last year. We've also added this to our calendar to make sure it goes out on time.

Here’s an example of the banner we’ll be using, which will be pushed live on the 22nd:

Let me know if you’d like to tweak anything before then, always happy to help!

action.text: Joy T assigned to Allie Borcena
Joy T moved this conversation from the Wolf IQ Projects inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi @allieB,

Looping in support for ths. Thank you!

Perfect thank you!
Also one last thing, can we sechedule the banner for the "managing Emergencies" page to come up on the home page like we had in the previous year, to pop up around 22 Dec?
Thanks.

Regards,

Faye Wu
BOH (UOM)
(Time: 5mins)

Hi Faye,

No worries! This is now added.

Hi Joy,

Sorry one last thing. Can we please add a link to the colours page in the "our patients" drop down?
Thank you!

Regards,

Faye Wu
BOH (UOM)

Hi Faye,

We truly appreciate your kind words! We’re so glad you’re happy with it.

It’s been wonderful working together on your new website page.

We look forward to working with you again soon and continuing to deliver great results together.

action.text: Allie Borcena moved this conversation from the Wolf IQ inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Joy,

Thanks for the update. We're super happy with it!

Regards,

Faye Wu
BOH (UOM)
Closing ticket while waiting for client feedback.
(Time: 210mins) dev + QA

Hi Faye,

We are happy to inform you that we have completed the following updates:

  1. Added a “Download Image” option
  2. Included a disclaimer: “There might be some colour discrepancies compared to the online image”
  3. Ensured all hex colours are updated

Could you take a quick look and let us know if everything looks good on your side?

Hi Faye,

Really appreciate your quick confirmation—glad to hear we’re good to go!

For your reference, the hourly rate for this work is $129.

We’ll now move ahead with your feedback and add the download option as requested. We’ll be sure to keep you in the loop with any updates along the way.

As always, feel free to reach out if anything comes up.

Hi Joy,

Yes we are happy to proceed.
Thanks.

Regards,

Faye Wu
BOH (UOM)

Hi Faye,

Happy Monday!

Absolutely—we're happy to proceed with adding a download option.

Before we start, we would also like to give you a heads up that this will take around 4-5 hours, including all the rest of your feedback.

So far, we’ve dedicated about 21 hours to bringing the Choose Your Colours page to life, which covers the following:
  1. Page Design
  2. Page Development
  3. Custom Functionality

We’re really excited to see it completed in line with your preferences. Let us know if you’re happy for us to proceed and we’ll take it from there.

I also reviewed our email and confirmed that there was a correction on the purple hex #490A54. This is now in our devs' queue.

Should you have any further queries, feel free to let us know.

Hi Joy, Yes we would like the download option please. Can I please suggest a few changes:
  • Under the "Colours are optional decoration on MP Ortho braces." line, can you please add that there might be some colour discrepancies compared to the online image?
  • Can we please change the boarder shape of the teeth from a circle to a rectangle?
  • Can we please resize/crop the teeth image so when you click from no colour to single colour the teeth are in the same spot?
  • The purple and dark purple currently are the same colour.
  • A few of the colours are quite a bit off from the hex colours - namely dark navy, green, light pink. Can we please make them a bit more similar to the hex?
Thank you! Regards, Faye Wu BOH (UOM)
(Time: 1260mins) Design+Dev+QA+Admin time

Hi Faye,

We are happy to inform you that we have completed the Choose Your Colours page.

👉Check the page here

We noticed that your reference website includes a download option for the chosen colours.

We’d be happy to add this feature to your page. It will take a little extra time as it needs custom code like the page colour functions, so we can work on it next week if that suits you.

Please let us know if you’d like us to go ahead.

We’re looking forward to hearing your thoughts! Have a lovely weekend!

Hi Faye,

No worries!

We'll send you an update on the "Choose Your Colours" page within the week.

Hi Faye,

No worries!

We'll send you an update on the "Choose Your Colours" page within the week.

Thank you Joy.

Regards,

Faye Wu
BOH (UOM)

Hi Faye,

We are happy to inform you that we have generated a QR code for the page.
👉 https://www.mportho.com.au/choose-your-colours/

Please see the attached image and try to test on your end as well.

Furthermore, we'll keep you posted on the page progress.
